1.title: Lago Cardiel
1.description:
Lago Cardiel area, Santa Cruz.

Estancia of 38,000 hectares.
Located 87 km from Gobernador Gregores.
Includes main house, staff house, forage shed, and more.

Land divided into paddocks, 36 km of shoreline with trout, salmon, and other fishing.

3.title: Lago del Desierto
3.description:
Plot of 11,615 hectares in the province of Santa Cruz.

3,400 meters of western and 2,900 meters of eastern shoreline along Lago del Desierto.
Located 4 km from the Las Vueltas River (also known as Río Gatica).

Landscapes with glaciers, waterfalls, valleys suitable for winter sports, and views of Mount Fitz Roy. Includes a ski slope on Mount El Crestón.

Rich flora and fauna: lenga, ñire, and guindo forests, as well as wildlife such as pumas, deer, foxes, and hares.

5.title: Lodge de pesca
5.description:
Incredible fishing lodge in El Calafate, Santa Cruz, in the Patagonian Steppe, near Perito Moreno National Park.

Land: 10,000 hectares with multiple development opportunities.

Water bodies:
Lake Olnie and Laguna Cristalina connected by a stream.
Rainbow trout fishing with an average weight of 3 kg.

Accommodation: Capacity for 15 guests, serviced by a team of 6 staff members.

Additional activities: Wildlife photo safaris in a rich natural setting.

6.title: Barrio Manantiales
6.description:
Property for sale.
Barrio Manantiales, El Calafate, Santa Cruz.

High-quality construction in the prestigious Manantiales neighborhood.
Ground floor: entrance hall, kitchen, dining area, multipurpose room (SUM), two bathrooms; access to both front and back yards.
First floor: three elegant bedrooms, one en-suite; basement over 170 m² for multiple uses.

All utilities available.

Financing option available.

7.title: Laguna Nimez
7.description:
Lot for sale – Laguna Nimez Reserve Area. Av. Costanera, El Calafate, Santa Cruz Province.

Area: 10,000 m²
Features: Ideal for tourism or residential development.

Additional details:
Panoramic views of mountains and hills.
Next to the Laguna Nimez Urban Ecological Reserve.
Quiet surroundings with high-end neighbors.

All services available.

8.title: Mallín Ahogado
8.description:
Cipreses del Sur subdivision – Mallín Ahogado, El Bolsón, Río Negro, Argentina.

Available lots are 2,500 m² with access to electricity, water, and gas.

Surrounded by native forests, just 6 km from the popular tourist town of El Bolsón.

A unique opportunity to acquire property in a privileged natural environment.
